original_text: For all who have sinned without the law will also perish without the law, and all who have sinned under the law will be judged by the law.
korean_text: 무릇 율법 없이 범죄한 자는 또한 율법 없이 망하고 무릇 율법이 있고 범죄한 자는 율법으로 말미암아 심판을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: For all who have sinned without the law
sentences.korean_translation: 율법 없이 죄 지은 모든 사람은

sentences.original_text: will also perish without the law
and all who have sinned under the law
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 율법 아래서 죄 지은 모든 사람은

sentences.original_text: will be judged by the law
